naslov: Prodaja, vila s okućnicom, prvi red do mora, Marina, Poljica! (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se prekrasna vila s okućnicom, prvi red do mora, okolica Trogira! Vila se prostire na zemljištu od 428 m2 i broji dvije etaže od kojih svakoj etaži pripada po 134 m2 prostora. Izgrađena je 2002. godine od crvene poroterm opeke i izolirana stiroporom. Južna i zapadna strana vile su u cijelosti obložene kvalitetnim bračkim kamenom. Unutarnja i vanjska stolarija je ručno rađena od kvalitetnog i pomno biranog drveta. Podovi su od parketa u spavaćim sobama i pločica u ostalim prostorijama. Grijanje je centralno, dok postoji i solarno grijanje vode i vanjskog tuša. Prizemlje čine sljedeće prostorije: - Dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom  50,00 m2 - Spavaća soba s kupaonicom 1  18,20 m2 - WC  1,90 m2 - Natkrivena terasa  22,00 m2 - Sprema 1  7,00 m2 - Sprema 2  5,50 m2 - Sprema 3  2,00 m2 Kat čine sljedeće prostorije: - Hodnik i stepenište  14,20 m2 - Spavaća soba s kupaonicom 2  17,00 m2 - Spavaća soba s kupaonicom 3  24,80 m2 - Spavaća soba s kupaonicom 4  31,10 m2 - Terasa 20,10 m2 (natkriveni dio 10,40 m2 i  nenatkriveni dio 9,70 m2) Uz vilu postoji i vanjska ostava površine 10 m2. Cijena: 1.200.000 Eura Prednosti: - Prvi red do mora - Otvoren pogled na more - Pješčana plaža - Mogućnost bavljenja turizmom A beautiful villa with a garden for sale, first row to the sea, near Trogir! The villa is spread over a plot of 428 m2 and has two floors, each floor of which has 134 m2 of space. It was built in 2002 from red Poroterm bricks and insulated with Styrofoam. The south and west sides of the villa are completely covered with high-quality Brač stone. The interior and exterior joinery is handmade from high-quality and carefully selected wood. The floors are parquet in the bedrooms and tiles in other rooms. The heating is central, while there is also solar heating of water and an outdoor shower. The ground floor consists of the following rooms: - Living room with kitchen and dining room 50.00 m2 - Bedroom with bathroom 1 18.20 m2 - Toilet 1.90 m2 - Covered terrace 22.00 m2 - Storage room 1 7.00 m2 - Storage room 2 5.50 m2 - Storage room 3 2.00 m2 The first floor consists of the following rooms: - Hallway and staircase 14.20 m2 - Bedroom with bathroom 2 17.00 m2 - Bedroom with bathroom 3 24.80 m2 - Bedroom with bathroom 4 31.10 m2 - Terrace 20.10 m2 (covered part 10.40 m2 and uncovered part 9.70 m2) There is also an outdoor storage room of 10 m2 next to the villa. Price: 1,200,000 Euros Advantages: - First row to the sea - Open sea view - Sandy beach - Possibility of tourism
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Etažno centralno na struju
